page.title: 08Parish Hall,Woodlesford
page.content: All Saint's Parish Hall was {built}in{ {1899.}The foundation stone was laid by Mrs.Calverley.It cost {Â£606,17s,8d.}to build. The {new hall}was {designed}by a local parishioner and architect { {Mr.James Thorpe}and begun in {1971} using the skills of local people where possible.It took 12 years to complete and cost {Â£15,000.}The hall is used every morning by the {Playgroup,by {Sunday School,Church lads and {girls,Brownies and Guides,Dancing Keep {fit and Rothwell Theatre Group.}It is also used for {Church Fetes }and special saturday night occasions.Volunteers take care of bookings and cleaning and the upkeep of the hall.
